website_summaries.verdict: This is the way to go if you're looking for a Philips air fryer that can cook large batches of food at a time.
pros: No need to wait for the fryer to preheat
Helps to cut down cooking time compared to an oven
Cooks up to 6 servings at a time
cons: This is a large machine that's going to take up a lot of room on your counter and in your cupboards

customer_reviews.title: the only thing i don't like is it smokes like a train
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok, the only thing i don't like is it smokes like a train... I have to cook with it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best idea EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I saw this on TV, but decided to give it a try. Boy was I happily surprised! I’ve fried fish, chicken & my kids use it for frozen chicken strips/fries & they love it! It’s easy to use, cuts regular cooking time in half & even better, it’s easy to clean!! Looking forward to seeing what more this incredible cooking machine can do!
customer_reviews.author: Myra Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I read other reviews before purchasing, and this sounded like a solid piece although more expensive than others. Food comes out crispy on the outside and tender inside. Love using it for salmon. There is nothing like frying in oil, so for items like french fries and sweet potato fries, it works well, but food will be different density than real oily fries. Air fried food is physically lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Valley Girl

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, well made and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to this. It's very sturdy, well made and easy to clean. I do wish you could turn the timer backwards. Odd that you can't. You have to just let it run down. Also need ventilation for high fat foods, as this will cause a lot of smoke. All high fat cooking will though. I bought a very popular cheaper brand (gowise) first that had far more features, but it felt cheap... And broke during my first use. Also, two weeks later they are still pending my refund. I plan on using this often so I'm willing to get through the learning curve. I'll update as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Default airfryer.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't do well for me it smoked not unless I poured water into it. I had a Phillips air fryer in the pass and it worked beautiful so don't know about this one. I paid dearly for this one. It's in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Burgess

customer_reviews.title: how well it cooks, time, tenderness etc.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this I always heard that Philips was a good air fryer, but I cooked (tried to cook) a whole chicken I put it in for 20mins one side turned it for another 20 it wasn't even half cooked the outside was and if left it in the outside would have burned I could have cooked it in my oven in that time and I know it would have been done. I am going to try one more time and if it doesn't work out will return it :( :( Does anyone have Twin Turbostar Airfryer
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Timer dial numbers flaked off - can’t set cook time
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the size and efficiency of this Air fryer but noticed early on that some of the markings on the time dial were flaking. Now most of the markings have flaked off. We have not used any detergents or abrasives on it - simply a soft cloth. For an appliance this expensive it is completely unacceptable. There are less expensive and more competitively designed products. Would not recommend buying this unless it’s the digital screen option.
customer_reviews.author: CJC658

customer_reviews.title: It was almost perfect but..
customer_reviews.text: Cooked fast, definitely took out a lot of fat of the foods, however anything we tried to cook, from fries to fish to other meat would smoke like crazy forcing us to use it outside the house on freezing weather. If you have open space or plan to use it on a warm state where the windows can be open I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fausto Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and easy to use Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: The fryer arrived today, I washed the parts and 20 mins later the kids were extremely happy wolfing french fries. A friend recommended it, since now we have to make so many meals at home and I couldn't be happier. So easy to use, no mess, no smoke, NO cons, just perfectly crispy fries. We will try lots more fun recipes soon, today fries was a huge success. Thank you Philips!!
customer_reviews.author: Syanae

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the writing on the dial all wiped off and a few months ago it would just turn off and now it doesn't work at all. For how expensive this was and it barely lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it cooks but really smoky
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it gives a crispness on the outside but tender inside. It does smoke - ALOT when I cook fatty foods. I always clean it after each use, but still get alot of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No manual and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The fryer came in a plain brown box, no manual or instructions, and is missing the mesh grate that goes in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast read.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!! It has met my expectations and more. Little or no oil and fries came out crispy. Frozen okra was great! I was able to cook 2 Cornish hens at one time and they looked and tasted like rotisserie. Easy to clean. I will hand wash just to be sure. This was an expensive purchase for me but I feel like it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Yoss

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Loud-Customer service is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an air fryer with this one, because my old air fryer of one year the basket rusted out terribly. So i paid a bit more for this one, but its loud when using it and smokes and sets off our fire alarm every time we use it. I did'nt have that issue with my old air fryer. I called customer service about another issue and got blown off,
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda21128

customer_reviews.title: Really love this airfryer❤️...........
customer_reviews.text: I always like philips appliances.It has a good quality.Its easy to use and easy to clean.The inside bucket with metal net is very good quality and cleans quickly.The recipe book is awesome and helps alot for cooking something new.It made life easier and keeps you healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It’s very easy to use and pretty easy to clean as well. It’s also cooks things from frozen in a very fast time so it’s made cooking certain things without planning much easier. We haven’t had to use any oil with the foods that we have cooked so it’s also been a healthier choice! I’m really happy with the addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo P.

customer_reviews.title: Makes foods crispy and cooking time is amazing quick.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite appliance. I fry bacon every morning, and only needs quick water and soap( with soft side of sponge). I’ve made everything from frozen fries to fresh breaded chicken breast. Everything turns out crispy, delicious, and very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Markie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: A good device and bakes quickly and well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean, easy to use and versatility
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: This Air Fryer developed a white powdery film all over it, wipe it off and 12 hours later it was right back. I never did use the item. It was was much too big anyway even with the distracting substance all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So versatile and fun to cook different foods in this. We keep it on the countertop as it gets used almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mantovani

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Eating
customer_reviews.text: Food comes out crispy..cleaning maybe a headache at times other than that good...
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cooking meat. Easy to use and really keeps the meat from drying out. A bit tough to get really clean but I don't use a dishwasher so maybe a bit easier to get rid of the greasiness for those who do.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sehn

customer_reviews.title: Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Too much smoke , I have to cook in my garage, blew my electric circuit, and continuous smoke alarm . Complained about it, they will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: F.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Crisps food so taste like fried! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Milioto

customer_reviews.title: Need to use it more to give it a better rating
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a a few times. The breaded pork chops were not tasty. Fries and steak were very good. Need to use it more in order to give it a true rating
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Hesitant to order a new kitchen appliance, but so glad I did
customer_reviews.author: S. stasser

customer_reviews.title: My Airfryer didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: At first, this airfryer worked fine, but it soon started taking longer and longer to cook. I've had it less than 6 months now and I can do french fries twice as fast in my regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kellerer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and works great once you know how to use it
customer_reviews.author: Pturner

customer_reviews.title: Wasted time / Energy ....especially during a time like this.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged , arrrived in a generic box looked like a used or reconditioned item...totally unacceptable! Big waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: raju singh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Life changer! We love it! So easy to use and perfectly cooked food!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beat appliance ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve made so many healthy good tasting foods for my kids. Definitely recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: AndiD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use just a lot of smoke when you cook meat
customer_reviews.text: I used it a lot to cook lamb and steak. Very easy to use but it produces a lot of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous machine!
customer_reviews.text: Best appliance I ever purchased. Can't rave enough about it. Everything from reheating pizza, to a chicken dinner. French fries, are out of this world. Buy, Buy, Buy
customer_reviews.author: Quincy, Swede

customer_reviews.title: 5 star air fryer .
customer_reviews.text: That’s the best air fryer I have.i had the very small size of same brand .I wish price was more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: April99

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for Mother’s Day. She said it was easy to use and clean but wished it had a drip pan to do more with it. Overall good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smokey and timer broke.
customer_reviews.text: This smokes a lot, especially with raw meat. After 2 months the timer broke. At least it turns on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. I do not have one myself, but after looking at it, I now want one. It is large enough for a whole chicken. Once I hear back on how the food tastes, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: rem

customer_reviews.title: Love the air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love the air fryer. So nice to have a healthy great tasting meal in such short time & not heat up the kitchen doing so!
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: The best air fryer in the market
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier love my air fryer I can cook delicious food without the guilt
customer_reviews.author: popsandmore

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own one!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product easy to use. There is virtually nothing this unit cannot make and a much healthier alternative to traditional frying.
customer_reviews.author: Badgerforlife

customer_reviews.title: this product stopped working
customer_reviews.text: this product stopped working 1 year and 10 months. no support for repairs is available by phillips or authorized repair service. the warranty for the appliance is 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient cooker! Time saver and meat is very tender.
customer_reviews.author: adwillard

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the directions, everything from potatoes to meat to eggs was dry and tasteless. Takes much more time and effort than sauteing or oven frying. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis G. Mercuri

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Fryer we use it all the time. Easy to clean and operate!
customer_reviews.author: Shockld

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air Fryer, works great and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what's not to like
customer_reviews.text: just getting started but so far so good. looking forward to frying/roasting veggies.
customer_reviews.author: tth

customer_reviews.title: Tasty food
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and food made according to instructions is quite tasty. On the other hand the clean up is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chicken fried in it turns out perfectly moist in the inside and crispy on the outside.
customer_reviews.text: I have never fallen in love with an appliance until I met the Phillips Premium Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever!!! Super easy to use. I wish I would have gotten this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McDonald

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for easy way to cook!
customer_reviews.text: We love this air-fryer! Big enough for lots of food and super easy to use! Hope it lasts more than 10years! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Thimmes

customer_reviews.title: Good product but dial numbers rubbed off.
customer_reviews.text: The numbers on the timer dial rubbed off after the second use
customer_reviews.author: Taipan

customer_reviews.title: Has no grill to sit the food on for frying!
customer_reviews.text: This did not come with the grill! the most important piece!
customer_reviews.author: Youngmrs.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Delight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to prepare food. My first try did not work out but I bought the cookbooks and now cooking is great. Food is juicy on the inside and crisp on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: I will Never buy from this company.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a half year, use it once /week. Here are all the things that happened : 1. The numbers are coming off on outside timer (even though I clean it carefully). 2. when I cook chicken, it smokes really like a train (even though I searched from the website, put a little bit of water in it)
customer_reviews.author: lcylcm

customer_reviews.title: So sad it uses Telfon/PTFE
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely in LOVE with this air fryer until I realized that it uses PTFE/Teflon coating. It cooks food beautifully. Potatoes and fries were amazing...light, crisp, delicious. Crab cakes had a lovely light crisp on them. But it has to go back. I am so disappointed that a product targeting people trying to eat healthfully uses such toxic chemicals. Do better Philips.
customer_reviews.author: MissJ1234

customer_reviews.title: Very poor concept
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, spent quite some time reading about features but the poorest features were well disguised. Very clumsy as compared to an Actifry...more time and trouble that it is worth even considering the larger capacity. It is the horse and buggy of air fryers and should be avoided for any of several other much more modern and useful air fryer designs. Do not waste your money. Apparently spent their money on marketing and not engineering. Excessive smoking occurs no matter how little spray is used.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I must of got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: loud noice like the fan is hitting something, dial for temp loose and does not work, doesn't cook food evenly.. returning.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I have two other air fryers and this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two other air fryers and this is the one I use the most. And will use it more when the baking pan for this largest model becomes available.again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: We love homemade French Fries in our house and wanted to see if that would workout. It doesn't the fries ended up sort of dry with a stall texture and taste. We sent the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Best Fryer in the market. We have made a ton of food using it and so far everything has been wonderful. From Fries to Wings to Burgers and fish - its all been REALLY good. Great purchase and anniversary gift for the Wife and I. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: GoAngus

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller Phillips version and wanted more space. As a vegetarian, I wanted an easy and fast way to make vegetables and heat up and crisp up frozen items from Quorn and Morningstar. It makes great vegetables with just a touch of oil, and it cooks veggie nuggets, burgers, tots and sausages really fast. Use it 4-5 times a week. I put off buying one since I already have a convection oven, but it's so much faster and more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RockyD

customer_reviews.title: air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Since this is the newest must have item for your kitchen I was excited to give this a try. I am sure I could have paid less for an air fryer but felt the need to splurge. I have used this at least a dozen times in two months and although some menu items are a little trickier than others (namely French fries) I have made some awesome meals and the flavor is excellent. Easy to use and clean and make ready for the next meal.
customer_reviews.author: scott maxson

customer_reviews.title: The best airfryer!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift for my sister, who loved my airfryer. Love the recipes that come with it, and this model is so much bigger than mine! You can make your favorite foods without deep frying.
customer_reviews.author: Karenech

customer_reviews.title: Not only frying but also grilling and baking! Best kitchen toy!
customer_reviews.text: Best Black Friday purchase of the year. To my surprise, the air fryer can not only do frying, but also baking and grilling! Have been using it every single day now. Can use it on anything that could be grilled or bake and come back with better results. My favorite kitchen toy now. Best part: no pre heating!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: We borrowed this item from a friend and fell in love with it so we had to buy our own. So easy to make all sorts of foods at home from the best french fries and onion rings to an entire chicken or pork tenderloin, but it's become harder to clean with each use. I made some excellent honey sesame chicken and it just hasn't recovered from it. I hope the baskets are replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Used daily!
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost on a daily basis! We have made just about everything you can think of. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: IdahoFolks

customer_reviews.title: Very glad to have this puppy
customer_reviews.text: We like fries and onion rings and fish... this lets us have what we like and it's very much healthier. Also flavorful. We really are glad to have one. Takes a bit of learning, so be prepared to find the right amount of time to cook. But even the mistakes disappeared quick!
customer_reviews.author: Twang

customer_reviews.title: Delicious foods
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fast and delicious food . One of my best purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: cathy schanz

customer_reviews.title: Great low fat cooker
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our AIr Fryer to prepare foods with a crispy finish and avoid all the oil and grease normally required. This has been fabulous so far. We've only used it about 4 times and each time we've tried a different food that turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W SantiagoMeyers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome absolutely love it. Large capacity and food is great and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like the Phillips Premium Air Fryer. I realize not every thing can or should be used with the Air fryer, such as shredded hash browns. Other than that I like it. Have to get use to using it, since I am a diabetic, and it will be good for me to use to get away from a lot of greasy food.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: No food smells at my kitchen because I cook at my apartment patio desk
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to clean at all. The nonstick coating may not last as it Described on description. I have to turn over the chicken to get crispy both sides as well as cooking the other food.
customer_reviews.author: francisco villa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve wanted one of these for a long time and finally gave in. There have been no regrets! It cooks most things in a reasonable amount of time, but be sure to check whatever you’re cooking halfway through. Most things need to be flipped. It is a little bulky, but we love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Conley

customer_reviews.title: a bit expensive but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Large volume and easy to use and very easy to clean. The canister is all dishwasher safe. A bit pricey but definitely worth the money if you think of cost per use.
customer_reviews.author: Ying Zhuge

customer_reviews.title: every one needs an air fryer
customer_reviews.text: now i can eat fried foods again without all the grease!
customer_reviews.author: edith

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this air fryer. It is easy to use and easy to clean. We have made burgers, fries, fish, french toast, pierogies, and chicken breast in it so far. They have all come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this air fryer. At last a fryer that can fit a few things in it!
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and easy to clean. Food comes out great. It's a little loud but nothing unbearable. Best kitchen appliance ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Peoples

customer_reviews.title: You dont know it yet, but you need this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know we needed this until we got it. Now it is pretty much all we use. It has replaced the toaster oven and the microwave. Cooks everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ExtremeMom

customer_reviews.title: It works! Food cooks fast and evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fast and even. We have had frozen egg rolls, sweet potato fries, cauliflower bites. No need for pre-heating.
customer_reviews.author: kg467

customer_reviews.title: Great family-sized air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Am so glad I believed the Good Housekeeping review and ordered this air fryer! We are loving it! Heats super fast and cooks as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Menucha

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, comes with small cook book, super great for re-heating also
customer_reviews.author: Hol

customer_reviews.title: Phillips xxl
customer_reviews.text: not very precise with the timer... and not practical to clean compared with the small one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart for easy cleaning better than the XL . I liked the digital controls on the XL this XXL you really don’t know where it’s set temp or time wise. I will get use to it. Phillips makes the best air fryer all the other brands are a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bronz

customer_reviews.title: Best way to prepare comfort food without all the fat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Rib Eye in 10 minutes, what more could you ask for? Though I do recommend not breading item unless you understand the additional steps required.
customer_reviews.author: Darklock63

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and can cook a lot of food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Philips Premium Airfryer XXL with Fat Removal Technology, Black, HD9630/98
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style Name:Black- XXL Airfryer (3lb/4qt)- Brown Box Packaging| Design:Air FryerThe Philips Airfryer XXL is the only Airfryer with fat removal technology that extracts and captures excess fat, more fat than other air fryer competitors. Now you can fry your favorite foods with little or no added oil AND remove fat from food, too. The result is delicious and healthier fried food that is as crispy as deep-fried with 90% less fat! The Airfryer can do more than just fry; it also grills, roasts, bakes, reheats, dehydrates and toasts taking on the role of multiple kitchen appliances, even toaster ovens. With over 200 easy-to-make and inspiring dishes to try, the Airfryer will become a one-stop solution for all of your meals. Philips Airfryer XXL also creates less smell and splattering than conventional fryers, it is easy to clean, safe and economical for your daily use! Based on fat captured in the basket, when cooking Pork belly for 20 min vs leading Air fryer brands. Compared to fresh fries prepared in a conventional deep fryer.
feature_bullets: The Philips Airfryer XXL is the healthiest way to fry, using little or no added oil to fry your favorite food. It's the only air fryer with fat removal technology that reduces and captures excess fat
With a 3 pounds/4qt capacity you can now make delicious meals for up to 6 people every day. Fits a whole chicken or 2 bags of frozen French fries with results just as crispy as deep-fried
The air fryer is instantly hot and ready to go in seconds, cooking 4 times faster than a conventional oven. With no preheat needed, you can save time and start cooking right away
Multi-cooking technology: Air fry, bake, grill, roast, reheat, dehydrate, and toast, all in the same device
Cleaning is simple: This Philips Airfryer XXL includes dishwasher-safe removable parts and a quick-clean basket to save you time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars372 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
